snippet: More than just mainstreaming, Frederick Douglass Boulevard is becoming trendy, with some old-timers fearing the loss of a familiar culture.
abstract: Frederick Douglass Boulevard in Harlem is experiencing a resurgence, becoming a trendy social destination for New York City residents who rarely used to venture north of 110th Street; old-time residents fear gentrification and popularity of area is leading to loss of familiar culture and threatening the fabric of the neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: More than just mainstreaming, Frederick Douglass Boulevard is becoming trendy, with some old-timers fearing the loss of a familiar culture.

headline.seo: A Harlem Resurgence Along Frederick Douglass Blvd.
headline.main: A Boulevard in Harlem Undergoes a Resurgence
headline.print_headline: A Boulevard In Harlem Undergoes A Resurgence
